---
name: New Story / Task
about: A template for adding a new story or task within an Epic
title: "[Story/Task Title] | [Epic Title]"
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

## Story + Context
As a ```[user+context]``` I want to ```[accomplish task or overcome problem]``` in to ```[outcome or success]```.

## Success Criteria
- If / then statements
- Objectives / metrics
